title: USDA Food Poisoning Prevention
description: Leveraged social media and machine learning techniques to collect and analyze data to predict foodborne illness outbreaks.

title: Hashtag Analysis for Stock Market Prediction
description: Used sentiment analysis to build a learning model to predict future movements in the S&P 500 index.

title: Is The Internet Dependent on Dependencies?
description: Explores how the reliance on remote JavaScript libraries could expose websites to functionality failures and potential risks in various failure scenarios.
